mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, GYSLB, GYSBM, GYSMC,GYSJC, DZ, PZH, SQKSSJ, SQJSSJ, SQFW, ZSSM, BZ, ZT, CJRID,BQYDM, CJSJ

D.ID, D.GYSBM, D.DPRTCODE, D.GYSMC,D.GYSJC,D.DZ, D.PZH, D.SQKSSJ, D.SQJSSJ, D.GYSLB, D.SQFW, D.BZ, D.ZT,D.BQYDM, D.ZSSM, D.CJRID, D.CJSJ,U.ID AS ZDRID,U.USERNAME AS ZDRUSERNAME,U.REALNAME AS ZDRREALNAME
mapper.select:
select
from D_015 where ZT = 1 and GYSLB = #{gyslb} and DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} and (GYSBM = #{gysbm} OR GYSMC = #{gysmc})

select to_date(to_char(D.SQJSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - to_date(to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as SYTS, B5.DPRTNAME AS JG_DPRTNAME,
from D_015 D LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON D.CJRID = U.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT B5 ON D.DPRTCODE=B5.ID where D.ZT = 1
order by D.GYSBM ASC,ID ASC
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order},ID ASC

select to_date(to_char(D.SQJSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - to_date(to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as SYTS,
from D_015 D LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON D.CJRID = U.ID where D.ZT = 1
order by D.CJSJ DESC
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}
mapper.insert: insert into D_015 (ID, DPRTCODE, GYSLB, GYSBM, GYSMC,GYSJC, DZ, PZH, SQKSSJ, SQJSSJ, SQFW, ZSSM, BZ, ZT, CJRID, CJSJ,BQYDM) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gyslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gysbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gysmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gysjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sqjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{bqydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

DPRTCODE,

mapper.update:
update D_015
GYSLB = #{gyslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GYSBM = #{gysbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GYSMC = #{gysmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GYSJC = #{gysjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DZ = #{dz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PZH = #{pzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQFW = #{sqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZSSM = #{zssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CJRID = #{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSJ = sysdate, SQKSSJ = #{sqkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SQJSSJ = #{sqjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BQYDM = #{bqydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_015 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GYSLB = #{gyslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GYSBM = #{gysbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GYSMC = #{gysmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GYSJC = #{gysjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZ = #{dz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PZH = #{pzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQKSSJ = #{sqkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SQJSSJ = #{sqjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SQFW = #{sqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZSSM = #{zssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CJRID = #{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSJ = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BQYDM = #{bqydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update D_015 set ZT = 0, CJRID = #{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSJ = sysdate where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

if.test: gyslb == 1 and keyword != null and keyword != ''

sql.if:
and ( UPPER(D.GYSBM) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.GYSMC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.GYSJC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.SQFW) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.PZH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.ZSSM) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.BZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.DZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(U.USERNAME) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(U.REALNAME) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')
)

if.test: gyslb == 2 and keyword != null and keyword != ''

sql.if: and ( UPPER(D.GYSBM) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.GYSMC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.PZH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.DZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.SQFW) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.BZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D.ZSSM) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(U.USERNAME) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(U.REALNAME) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqksrqBegin != null and paramsMap.sqksrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqksrqEnd != null and paramsMap.sqksrqEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqjsrqBegin != null and paramsMap.sqjsrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqjsrqEnd != null and paramsMap.sqjsrqEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.whrqBegin != null and paramsMap.whrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.whrqEnd != null and paramsMap.whrqEnd != ''

sql.if: and ( UPPER(D015.GYSBM) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D015.GYSMC) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.idList != null and paramsMap.idList != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.gyslbList != null and paramsMap.gyslbList != ''

mapper.insert:
insert into D_015 (ID, DPRTCODE, GYSLB, GYSBM, GYSMC,GYSJC,DZ, PZH, SQKSSJ, SQJSSJ, SQFW, ZSSM, BZ, ZT, CJRID, CJSJ)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gyslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gysbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gysmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.gysjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sqkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sqjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp from dual
mapper.select:
select
from D_015 D where D.ZT = 1 and (D.SQKSSJ is null or trunc(D.SQKSSJ) <= trunc(sysdate) ) and (D.SQJSSJ is null or trunc(D.SQJSSJ) >= trunc(sysdate)) and D.GYSLB = 2 and D.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode}
